title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Peer Assessment-Based Learning Design Language Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can plan science experiment projects using a learning design language that incorporates peer assessment processes.
Learners can provide specific and actionable feedback on peers' work using mobile-based peer assessment tools.
Learners can interpret the operational implications of learning design language and propose improvements based on an activity theory framework.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
